articles.title: Gut microbiome remodeling induced by microplastic exposure in humans.
articles.summary:
Here's a clear summary sentence:

Microplastic exposure alters gut microbiome composition, potentially increasing harmful bacteria and decreasing beneficial bacteria that protect against disease.

articles.title: Antibodies to watch in 2026.
articles.summary:
Here's a concise summary focusing on the key points:

A comprehensive review tracks the growing landscape of antibody therapeutics, highlighting increasing global development and diverse clinical pipelines across various medical indications.
